thread.section_title: Hotel Le Walt - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Perfect Paris hotel!
thread.title_full: Perfect Paris hotel! - Review of Hotel Le Walt, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Lisa2646
title: Perfect Paris hotel!
text: Hotel Le Walt was everything as advertised! The hotel is within walking distance of the Eiffel Tower, many wonderful restaurants and the Champs Elysse (if you like to walk). Parking was less than 1 block away and the hotel allows you to park and check in before going to the public parking. The concierge spoke English well and provided many helpful tips, reservations as well as an umbrella on a rainy morning! Will definitely stay again!
